Nelson - Dark Lord Deck
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Characters: Nelson - Dark Lord Deck
By Farmer Jimbo on Wednesday, August 23, 2000 - 02:36 pm:

Nelson can be one of the most frustrating opponents in MRBC II. Here's a peak into his Dark Lord deck:

Mocchi3xRound3xRoll

Henger3xDodge Program2xTrue Vision3xHyperspeed

Pixie3xKiss3xRecover3xStep3xSoar

Any Monster3xDodge3xGrit3xRetreat

Breeder3xMango3xCool Judge3xConfusion
---------3xFainted3xBusy Time

By Trickster on Wednesday, August 23, 2000 - 05:04 pm:

Notes on beating this deck:

Note that the *only* attack card that Nelson has is "Kiss." So quite honestly, the way I've found to beat this deck with your own deck is to just get rid of one card from your hand each turn, whether it's using the card, or converting it to GUTS. This is long and tedious, yes, but it seems to work. Especially if you hold a "busy time" back in your deck or two for use just before the end. Yes, Nelson can whittle away at your GUTS, but he'll be using a precious card to do so. And when you do get enough GUTS saved up, you can use your one card for a turn to attack him, forcing him to either take the damage, or to dodge, using up yet another card.
